alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Tarrant (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 16 at 4:46PM CDT until March 16 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Tarrant County in north central Texas... Northwestern Dallas County in north central Texas... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 446 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Euless, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dallas, Arlington, Garland, Irving, Grand Prairie, Mesquite, Carrollton, Richardson, Euless, Bedford, Grapevine, Coppell, Hurst, Farmers Branch, Southlake, University Park, Colleyville, Addison, Highland Park and DFW Intl Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central Texas. For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
